extension_description.message: Allows you to download all files within a sharedlink folder directly from the webpage, while preserving the folder structure after downloading.

pop__body_desc.message:
This is the BLOON Sharelink Downloader. This page is a sharelink page for a folder.

Click the "DOWNLOAD ALL" button to download all the files within the folder, and the folder structure will be preserved after downloading.

pop__body_desc_disabled.message: This is the BLOON Sharelink Downloader. This page is not the sharelink page for a folder, so it will not be effective.

pop__auto_popup_checkbox_label.message: Automatically show this popup when the page opens

dl__start_dwonload_and_warn_text.message: Downloading started. Please keep this window open during the download process; closing it will interrupt all downloads.
